111211.content:
Ino was just walking down the street to Naruto’s home to deliver a bouquet of flowers. Someone from the household had ordered them and asked it to be hand delivered to the home, and Ino did as the person asked. Upon walking up the front steps of the home, she noticed that the front door wasn’t locked. She found this out when she knocked on the door, only for it to open up a little as she hit the door. Worried about a possible intruder, Ino laid the bouquet on the first step and snuck inside the home.

She thought maybe a break in was occurring or maybe some for of vandalization, but no traces of such acts could be found around the downstairs portion of the house. Although she did notice a couple weird things. One was that in the kitchen, seated at the head of the table, there was a white highchair. But the highchair looked to big for a baby and probably could have fit herself if she got in it. There was also a play area set up filled with stuffed animals, soft fabric toys, and rattles. But what was strange was that Ino had never recalled Naruto or Hinata ever mentioning they had a new baby, or were possibly babysitting someone. So what was with all of this?

Ino has jolted a bit when she heard some movement upstairs and quietly crept up the steps. She looked in the kids rooms first. She didn’t see anything out of the ordinary and everything checked out as untouched. But then she took a look in Hinata and Naruto’s room, and saw two things off the bat.

Firstly, the room was a nursery. A nursery fit for a big baby. The room’s floor was decorated with spruce wood and foam mats with baby letters on them. Also, there was a big changing table that was stocked with adult diapers and changing supplies such as baby powder and baby oil. Ino had saw something out of the corner of her eye and saw a closet full of onesies and cute little outfits that would probably fit on Ino if she tried to get in them. But what explained everything was what she had seen next. She saw a white crib that had carved designs of foxes on it.

When she walked over and peered inside the crib she saw the explanation to all of this nursery and babyish furniture. Inside the crib was....
111211.title: She caught him

1112111.content:
She looked inside of the crib and saw the cutest sight there was Naruto laying on his side curled up in a orange onesie that showed a bulge that was obviously a diaper that he was also wearing and finally he had his thumb in his mouth sucking it as it looked like his pacifier had come out of his mouth she had to stop herself from making any noise at the cuteness that she saw not wanting to wake him up

Does she stay around until he wakes up or leave not wanting to be caught?

"I left his apartment and came here to meet with you after putting the flowers I had in a vase and shut the door for him so nobody else would find him like that and now here we are I thought you should know of this with you being on his team Sakura just do not tell anybody else otherwise his reputation would be ruined" Ino says recounting the events of earlier today to her best friend

"Ino you should have kept this to yourself I don't think Naruto would have wanted anybody knowing about this especially me since if he wanted me to know about it he would have told me himself" Sakura reprimanded her friend for telling her this now she wouldn't be able to look at her team mate and friend the same

11121112.title: Leave

111211122.content:
True to her word, Sakura didn’t visit Naruto after she was informed of his personal life. She believed everyone deserved some modicum of privacy including their lives, and what Ino was doing was violating that privacy. But she couldn’t stop that nagging feeling in her head. The feeling to go talk to Naruto about it. Obviously she didn’t want to bring it up to him as her beliefs would be contradicted by her actions, but she also wanted to know why Naruto acted like a baby.

Her thoughts were immediately disrupted when she heard some crying in the distance. She didn’t hear it at first, but as she got closer to the alleys, which she was going to pass by, she heard a soft, but faint, crying noise. As she crept through the alleys, she found the source of the crying. It was Naruto! She didn’t know if he recognized her or not, so she knelt down to his eye level, as Naruto was curled up into a ball, hugging his knees with his hands and crying on said knees.

“Naruto?” Sakura whispered calmly. But he whisper wasn’t calming for Naruto, who began trembling as his friend was a foot away from him. The Alley that Sakura was in was pretty dark, despite it being midday, and she couldn’t make out Naruto’s exact clothes or injuries, if he had any of the latter. She could only make out the silhouette of her friend. In order for her to make sure he was okay, they would have to go into the light, although Naruto didn’t seem like he was in the mood to move.

“Okay, Wait here, I’m going to go get someone to help.” Sakura said as she went to enlist the help of....

So she decided to get the help of Ino who already knew of his secret just in case she ran as fast as she could to where she knew Ino would be at this time hoping that Naruto would be okay while she was gone she soon saw Ino and caught up to her and says in a panicked voice "Ino, I need your help it's Naruto something is wrong with him"

Sakura opened the door to the Hokage's office to see a strange sight there was Naruto in a diaper sitting on Tsunade's lap as she was breastfeeding him like a baby, Sakura knew that Tsunade saw Naruto as a son but this was taking it too far sure it was a cute sight to behold the friend she knew for years who was an orphan being loved and babied by the greatest medical ninja in the whole world who never had a kid of her own finally able to be a mother

"What are you two doing?" Sakura asked shocked at the strangely cute sight in front of her

How do they react?
11133.title: Tsunade breastfeeding a diapered Naruto

111331.content:
Obviously, when Tsunade and Naruto were being asked about what they were doing by Sakura, they were surprised Naruto was the first one to react, as he began to sport a major blush and tried to hide himself in between Tsunade’s breasts, burying his head into them. Tsunade however, wasn’t entirely shocked. Yes, her expression was one of surprise, but she didn’t try to hide what she was doing. “Why hello Sakura! What brings you here.” Tsunade asked, trying to change the subject.

“Don’t try and change the subject here, what are you two doing? Why is Naruto in a diaper? Why were you breastfeeding him?” Sakura questioned. Tsunade had sighed and began explaining everything to Sakura about what she and Naruto were doing, seeing as there wasn’t an easy way out of this.

“Well, I know you are aware of Naruto’s life as a little kid. He was bullied, beaten, and used as a scapegoat for the village. He had to grow up and adapt to an environment that wanted him crippled or dead. As he got older and as his life was driven into a dangerous zone from The Akatsuki and Madara, he had to grow up again and adapt. However, now that his life is at peace, he wants to relive something he never got to experience. A childhood. More specifically, a babyhood. He never got to be a kid with his life in danger all the time, but now that it is not, he can try to give himself a childhood.” Tsunade explained, trying to put it in simpler terms so Sakura could understand.

Sakura took all the information in and let it soak before she spoke again. It was at this point that Naruto began to come out of his ‘hiding spot’ and began to feed from Tsunade’s breasts once more. Sakura saw this of course, and slightly giggled. “So how did this involve you?” Sakura asked, not seeing the correlation between Tsunade and Naruto’s attempt to create a childhood for himself. Tsunade had cleared her throat before speaking.

“Well, Naruto came to me about this problem first. He wanted me to be his caregiver, essentially. Someone to care for him in a motherly way and to treat him like a baby. I agreed, but I was a little skeptical at first, thinking this may have been one of his pranks, but as you can see, it wasn’t. He was genuinely trying to recreate a moment in time that was rudely snatched away from him.” Tsunade explained. Naruto had stopped suckling and resigned himself to resting his head on Tsunade’s breasts. Sakura was about to ask another question, but Tsunade answered Sakura’s question before she could ask. “I’ve been doing this with him for a few months now. Hinata and his kids don’t know about this, and I’m afraid that now that you’ve seen him like this, maybe you will endanger him to the scrutiny of his wife and children.” Tsunade explained as she began to fix her bra and her shirt.

“I promise that I’m not going to spread this information to anyone. I’m glad that you are doing this, and maybe if you would allow me, I would like....”
111331.title: Surprised at being caught

1113311.content:
"I would like to help care for him" Sakura asked with a light blush since she found this to be quite cute and knew that she was one of the reasons that he didn't have a childhood since she was too obsessed with Sasuke when she was younger to see that didn't have a childhood the only thing she remembered doing was complain to Sasuke that he didn't have parents to show him right from wrong which didn't go well for her, she made fun of him for playing with Konohamaru and his friends in his early years not realizing that he was helping him while also giving himself a chance of childhood since nobody played with him as a child they just listened to their parents and avoided him

Plus Sakura was kind of getting sick of the usual routine her life had helping at the hospital and going home to be a housewife to a husband that is never around and a daughter who didn't get along with her as much as she wished they would, so maybe having a baby to look after would be nice even if it was her friend who was said baby

"Sure Sakura, you can be his ........"
1113311.title: To help care for him

choices: Protest that he was a big boy
11133112.content:
“Sure Sakura. You can be his Babysitter~” Tsunade spoke softly as she picked up Naruto and cradled him in her arms. “However, I will mainly be caring for him so I will only call you up when I cannot give him any attention. Whether it be that I’m busy or.....yeah. Just when I’m busy.” Tsunade explained. Sakura chuckled at Tsunade’s train of thought coming to a halt.

The rest of the conversation was only about Sakura’s new shipment of medical equipment, which would be arriving shortly after 5:00 pm. Sakura sighed as that was too long of a wait, but it would all be worth it. She retreated back to the Hospital to continue working. Throughout the day, however, she couldn’t stop thinking about Naruto. It may have been excitement or maybe just genuine curiosity, but she was so intrigued about Naruto’s lifestyle. She couldn’t stop thinking about it even when the shipment arrived. She was still lost in thought and imagination of the things that she would do with Naruto. Feeding him, changing him, reading him stories, maybe even taking him out for a stroll~! The possibilities seemed endless.

————————————————

After around a week, Tsunade and Sakura talked with one another about Naruto. He was much more behaved then Sakura had previously thought. She expected a babyish Naruto to be rambunctious and unruly, but he proved to be quite the opposite. He was well-behaved, but could be quite emotional when it came to his ‘mommy’ (Tsunade) leaving him. He was also extremely cuddly and affectionate towards anything while in this headspace.

Today, Tsunade and Sakura were calling again, but this time, it was a call asking Sakura to babysit. Tsunade had promised to go out with a couple of friends today and she completely forgot about it. It wasn’t until one of her friends called and asked her if the plans to go out were ‘still on’. Sakura had obviously agreed to watch Naruto, but Tsunade would be dropping Naruto off at Sakura’s house, as Tsunade’s friends were going to be at her house doing things that young babies shouldn’t have to witness.

And so, here we are. Sakura was now waiting for Naruto and Tsunade. Sakura had told her daughter about Naruto’s lifestyle, so that when she came home and found her mother playing, feeding, or even changing Naruto, she would know why and wouldn’t question anything. Oh an if she told anyone she would be grounded for life. Sarada obviously agreed to those terms of agreement and didn’t say a word to anyone.

Sakura heard a knock on the door and got up. She walked over and opened the door and saw Tsunade with Naruto, who had a massive blush spotted on his face. He was wearing a blue onesie with white, letter blocks patterned all over. He was also wearing a diaper underneath the onesie, which was noticeable as it mad a large bulge around his waste. Tsunade was simply wearing Her normal attire and smiled when she saw Sakura.

“Hello! So sorry we were late! It’s just that the little one had put up a little fuss about what to wear today, right Naruto~” Tsunade turned her head to ask Naruto, who hung his head lower and hid his face in his hands.

“Mama~! Stop it! You’re embawwassing me..” Naruto spoke in a lisp. Sakura couldn’t help but squeal in delight as she let Naruto inside, where he sat on the couch and hid his face in one of the pillows on the couch. Sakura couldn’t help but awe over Naruto’s cuteness and turned her attention to Tsunade, who gave her a diaper bag and a few things to note.

“So, make sure he takes a nap around noon, as he tends to get cranky if he doesn’t. If he asks to go outside, let him go out in your backyard, I don’t want the village to see their leader in public in a diaper and acting like a baby, and make sure he uses his diaper, he has a tendency to think he’s a big boy sometimes.” Tsunade explained. Sakura took in all the information before sharing their goodbyes, but before Tsunade could leave, Naruto began to....

As Tsunade was heading towards the exit of Sakura's house Naruto shot off of the couch like a bullet and clung to Tsunade's back crying his eyes out saying "Me don' want mommy to go" getting emotional at the prospect of Tsunade leaving him

'he really is a mommies boy' Sakura thought to herself watching the cute seen in front of her but also felt a pang of jealousy at the fact that he wanted to be with Tsunade more than herself she knew him longer

"I know sweetie but mommy will be back later to pick you up so be good for Sakura" Tsunade says as she was trying to peel her baby boy off of her and his actions were making her want to take him home and cancel her plans with her friends but she held strong and slowly peeled him off of her so she didn't hurt him and pulling him into a hug and kissed his forehead

She put Naruto on the couch and sat with him for a little while and handed him his favorite toy to play with and once he was calm she pulled him into another hug and calmly said "Naru I am going to go now so be good for mommy" than she kissed his forehead a final time and left for the exit of Sakura's house

With Tsunade gone Naruto?
111331121.title: Cry for his mommy

choices: Had wet his diaper and the couch
Had crawled over to the kitchen and was making a mess
1113311211.content:
Sakura went over to Naruto and picked him up, and was about to bring him over to the playpen to play with the toys that she had gotten him. The toys were made for babies and mainly had to do with the five senses. Like ‘touch’ and ‘feel’, while other toys were educational and helped babies learn their shapes and colors. Before Sakura even got halfway to the playpen, Naruto began to cry once again. Sakura sighed and bounced Naruto in her arms gently. “It’s okay little one~ Your mommy will be back~ It’s okay~ It’s okay~” Sakura spoke in a soft and motherly tone.

While the voice and the bouncing seemed to calm Naruto down just a little bit, he was still upset. “Buh I wan mama!!” Naruto bawled, trying to push his way out of Sakura’s arms. However, Sakura held onto Naruto so he wouldn’t fall, even though Naruto began to wriggle and squirm.

This continued for a little while longer before Naruto tired himself out. He didn’t fall asleep, but he gave up on trying to squirm his way out of Sakura’s hold and his cries were reduced to sniffles. He had exhausted all of his energy for now and used the remaining bits of his energy to hold onto Sakura. “I’m sowwy Aunty...” Naruto whispered softly, sniffling shortly after. Sakura smiled and slightly blushed when Naruto had referred to her as ‘Aunty’, but felt happy that she was considered as part of Naruto’s family. At least his regression family, so to speak.

“It’s okay baby. I understand that you want your mommy and that you you love her very much, but you need to remember that she has friends and family as well. And she needs to spend some time with them. It’s like you with Hinata and your kids. Wouldn’t you want to spend time with them if you hadn’t seen them in a while?” Sakura explained, trying to get Naruto to further understand where Tsunade was coming from.

“Mhm..” Naruto replied as he began to yawn. Sakura giggles when she heard the yawn and laid Naruto on the couch. There was a cover on the couch to prevent any messes that Naruto may make. She got a soft, red, wooly blanket and draped it over Naruto’s body, tucking him in.

“The same is with Tsunade. So don’t take it personally, honey. She still loves you.” Sakura said as she knelt down to put a pacifier in Naruto’s mouth. It was a plain, orange pacifier and kissed his forehead. “Now go to sleep. If you need Aunty for anything, just call.” Sakura said as she got up and turned on a baby monitor. Naruto had suckled on the pacifier for a couple minutes before falling asleep.

————————————

During his nap, Sakura was doing chores around the house, like the laundry and tidying up her and Sarada’s rooms. Just as Sakura was finishing cleaning her room, she heard Naruto call out to her. “Aunty!!” Naruto exclaimed. Sakura jolted and ran over to Naruto, thinking that he had hurt himself, only to see that he...

1132.title: Himawari

11321.content:
The Uzumaki household held a secret. A very weird, but otherwise adorable secret. Naruto, the Hokage, lives to be diapered and babied. This love to be babied came from his desire to have a childhood. Caring for his kids with Hinata made him realize that he was missing something in his life. And it was being cared for as a kid. Being babied and cared for by someone who genuinely loved him. Now, he could’ve told Hinata about his desire, but he was scared of the rejection or the criticism he would earn from his wife. Boruto was not someone he would indulge his secret with, so he decided to indulge it with his daughter. A kindred and wonderful young girl with a loving and kind spirit, she understood her father. It wasn’t because she knew her father’s pain, but she couldn’t imagine herself living the life that Naruto lived as a boy. After all, he did recant the stories of his hard and awful life as a kid to his children sometimes, but only the ones safe for their innocent ears.

Himawari and Naruto began to be “Mommy and Baby” behind closed doors, or when Hinata and Boruto were nowhere to be found. Currently, Himawari was playing House with Naruto, who was clad in thick diaper with green Leaf Village insignia all over the diaper. He was also sucking a plain, white pacifier and was wearing blue booties and mittens. He was being cradled by Himawari, who was feeding him a bottle of formula.

“Good baby~ You’re being so good for me today~ Maybe if you finish all your milky, mommy will give you a surprise!” Himawari exclaimed happily at her ‘baby’, who was greedily suckling the contents of the bottle. It wasn’t long before Naruto finished his bottle but, he was now sporting a....
11321.title: she is playing house with him

113211.content:
Naruto finished his bottle, but he was now sporting a soggy, wet diaper. The diapers he was wearing had a high absorbency and could hold a lot of liquid, so Himawari didn’t change him just yet. She looked at the time and saw that it was time to put the baby down for a nap. “Okay baby~ Time for you to go Ni Ni for mommy~” Himawari said as she carried Naruto to her room. Himawari had secretly made a little place for Naruto to sleep in her room. It was a toddler bed that was reconstructed to fit Naruto. Of course, she didn’t do this on her own. She had help from Sarada.

Yes, the young Uchiha knew about this, but she didn’t say anything as she knew that it would be embarrassing and utterly humiliating for the Famous Uzumaki if the village found out he loved to act like a huge baby. However, she helped out Himawari whenever she could and whenever she wasn’t busy with any ninja duties. But back to Naruto and Himawari.

Himawari laid Naruto down for his nap in his toddler bed, which was baby-blue with soft, fuzzy blankets and sheets in the same color as the bed. Naruto immediately reached for one of his pillows and began cuddling and nuzzling the pillow before falling asleep shortly afterwards. To make sure he was asleep and not trying to cause any mischief, Himawari put a music box on a nightstand, which was next to the toddler bed. The music box began to play a soft lullaby for Naruto. The song was called “Hush Little Baby Don’t Say A Word.” Himawari felt tired herself listening to it, and began to walk towards her bed, got in it, and began to fall asleep.

When Himawari awoke, there was someone standing in the open doorway, which she forgot to close, and saw....

You see, Naruto stayed a baby, even when Tsunade offered him the choice to stop. Today, Naruto has scheduled naps, he eats mostly puréed food and formula, if not, then just regular milk. He constantly gets changed at least several times a day and he even goes to a nursery. Many of his female friends supported his decision and even babysit him at times, while his male friends are not firm supporters of it, they do respect Naruto’s decision. So let’s take a look at a day, or possibly all, of Naruto’s life!

11533.content:
What if Naruto never wanted to be a ninja when he was younger? What if he wanted to just gain back his childhood or was scared of ninjas for what they did to him? Maybe because of this fear, being afraid all the time about his life, or maybe because of his desire to be a kid again, he regresses? What if the Third made it so that Naruto would never be a ninja and he would live his days a big baby, seeing his needs as something that should be granted and was approved by the council? What if however, he is adopted in the Shippuden or Boruto era by a family or someone. For example, in shippuden, he could be adopted by Asuma and Kurenai, or maybe even Tsunade. In the Boruto Timeline, he could be adopted by an Adult Sakura and Sasuke, or maybe even adopted by and adult Hinata.

The possibilities are endless and the storyline could be tempting! So let’s explore these shall we? What’ll it be? Shippuden or Boruto?

choices: Sasuke comes into the village the day after the plan is drawn
Sasuke takes a while, but comes to the leaf
15123.content:
Naruto was in his office, rubbing his temples as he struggled to find a solution for the task that he was asked to carry out, but he couldn’t find any. The task that he was given was to find a way to put Sasuke Uchiha in his place. This was given to him by his daughter, who surprisingly wanted her father to be punished. You see, Sakura and Sarada we’re struggling. While Sakura ran the hospital, it wasn’t enough to cover the house payments and were on the verge of being evicted. This happened because the money was being stolen by someone who had access to the Uchiha’s bank account. Luckily the money was tracked outside the village and was assumed to be Sasuke’s doing. Not only was he stealing from his family, but when he rarely came home, he would act aggressive and abusive towards Sakura for the simplest things. Maybe if dinner was a little late, she would be slapped. If she was wearing a ‘skimpy’ dress, she would have her clothes thrown in the trash and burned. If she was out late, Sasuke would lock her out of the house and wouldn’t let her in for the rest of the night. Sarada tried to stop it, but she would always be treated the same way, if not, harsher. If she spoke up about the abuse, her father threatened her with her own life!

While Sarada spoke to Naruto about this, he was not only shocked, but outraged at Sasuke’s behavior, although he had no idea what to do. He could banish Sasuke from leaving the village, but that wouldn’t work as he technically lives outside the village already! He could force Sasuke to divorce his wife, but there’s the possibility he may take his anger out on his wife and possibly kill her. As Naruto was devising his plan, his wife had called. Apparently Himawari had an accident at school and “needed diapers as a punishment”. That sentence that left Hinata’s mouth turned a lightbulb on in Naruto’s head. That would be Sasuke’s punishment! To be diapered and treated as a baby! He wanted to act all tough, bratty, and immature, then he would be treated as such. All that was needed was the council’s approval and a plan to be initiated.

——————————————-

The council had approved of Naruto’s actions against Sasuke and a plan was drawn. Sasuke would be immediately restrained and sedated as soon as he entered the village next time, and would be barred from using his chakra to prevent any escape attempts. Then, he would be placed in Sakura and Sarada’s care, but they would get the help of friends and family to help establish Sasuke’s new place in life. As the Village’s biggest baby. All that was needed now, was patience.
15123.title: Boruto Timeline

As much as Ino didn't want to get the diapers herself she knew if her father were to get them people would assume they were for her or that they were expecting another baby and she didn't want to risk her secret coming out so she headed out to buy her own diapers she also made sure to pack some spare clothes just in case she had another accident since she now had the potty training of a baby

Ino quickly left her home and quickly headed over to the nearest shops while making sure nobody she knew saw her she was being paranoid but nobody was to know about her secret especially people from her graduating class Sakura would have a field day if she found out about this so as she entered the shop she made sure to be extra cautious to look around for people she knew

Ino made her way to the baby section of the store and thought it best to get diapers over training pants since she had the control of a baby and training pants wouldn't hold many accidents so she reluctantly brought the diapers she found a pack of purple diapers and couldn't resist buying them she also made sure to get wipes and baby powder

As she was buying her items.......

1553112.content:
Naruto and Hinata have a Polyamory relationship. Which is where Hanabi comes in. Sense Hinata and Naruto got married Naruto had been hitting it of with Hanabi. Hinata knew this and even helped her sister with her first time having sex with Naruto. However the three of them are now shopping for Hanabi's new life which well now contact of diapers, cribs, changing, feeding, etc.

"Hanabi let's get you changed." Hinata said as she pulled out a pink diaper. As Hanabi got changed the first thing she noticed was the thickness of the diaper between her legs which forced them apart a bit.
"So what should we do first mommy?" Hanabi asked "well I suppose we can....".
1553112.title: Hinata and Naruto treat her like a baby

15531121.content:
"Well I suppose we can show off our new baby" Hinata answered causing Hanabi to blush lightly she may have asked for this but she wasn't sure she was ready to be seen in public like this but if that was what mommy wanted she wouldn't argue with her on it and shyly nodded her head in approval

Hinata helped her sister into a cute white short sleeve shirt dress that had a cute cartoon bowl of ramen on it with the words miso cute under it then put on the matching pink polka-dot ruffle shorts that went with it they helped cover the diaper but it was still obvious she was wearing one, she tied Hanabi's long hair into pigtails using pink ribbon to hold them in place

Hanabi looked at her reflection in the mirror and she looked like an overgrown toddler right now causing her to blush even more than before "Don't you look cute Nabi" Hinata says when she was done dressing her baby sister causing Hanabi to just nod her head than Hinata finished it off by opening a packet of pacifiers and putting one in her sisters mouth

With the new baby ready to go out Hinata called Naruto to bring the stroller which he did in no time and Naruto easily lifted up Hanabi and helped her into the stroller than he says "You look cute in the outfit I chose for you"

Hanabi blushed and says "Fank yoo" through her paci making her sound like a baby or toddler
